mapper.select: SELECT B.MENU_NO AS "menuNo" , B.MENU_ORDR AS "menuOrdr" , B.MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , B.UPPER_MENU_NO AS "upperMenuId" , B.MENU_DC AS "menuDc" , B.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS "relateImagePath" , B.RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS "relateImageNm" , B.PROGRM_FILE_NM AS "progrmFileNm" , (SELECT C.URL FROM COMTN_PROGRM_LIST C WHERE B.PROGRM_FILE_NM = C.PROGRM_FILE_NM ) AS "chkURL" FROM COMTN_MENU_CREAT_DTLS A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_MENU_INFO B ON A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO WHERE B.Menu_NO > 0 AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = 0 AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT C.AUTHOR_CODE from COMTN_EMPLYR_SCRTY_ESTBS C WHERE C.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tmpUniqId}) ORDER BY MENU_ORDR

SELECT B.MENU_NO AS "menuNo" , B.MENU_ORDR AS "menuOrdr" , B.MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , B.UPPER_MENU_NO AS "upperMenuId" , B.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS "relateImagePath" , B.RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS "relateImageNm" , (SELECT C.URL FROM COMTN_PROGRM_LIST C WHERE B.PROGRM_FILE_NM = C.PROGRM_FILE_NM ) AS "chkURL" FROM COMTN_MENU_CREAT_DTLS A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_MENU_INFO B ON A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO WHERE A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from COMTN_EMPLYR_SCRTY_ESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tmpUniqId}) ORDER BY B.MENU_ORDR
SELECT URL FROM COMTN_PROGRM_LIST WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM = (SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM FROM COMTN_MENU_INFO WHERE MENU_NO = #{menuNo})

SELECT MIN(MENU_NO) FROM COMTN_MENU_INFO WHERE UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo} AND MENU_ORDR = (SELECT MIN(MENU_ORDR) FROM COMTN_MENU_CREAT_DTLS A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_MENU_INFO B ON A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO WHERE A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE FROM COMTN_EMPLYR_SCRTY_ESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tmpUniqId}) AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo})

SELECT count(MENU_NO) FROM COMTN_MENU_INFO WHERE UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo} AND MENU_ORDR = (SELECT MIN(MENU_ORDR) FROM COMTN_MENU_CREAT_DTLS A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_MENU_INFO B ON A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO WHERE A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE FROM COMTN_EMPLYR_SCRTY_ESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tmpUniqId}) AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo})
